name: Just Another Sand Game
description:
A small game I made with LOVE2D. It features 36 unique elements, including water, slime, quicksand, and more!

I made this project so I could get accustomed to the LOVE2D framework. Admittedly, many parts of the game are not well programmed, but hopefully this shouldn't impact performance too much. I plan on making a sequel in the future with better optimization and organization, so suggestions would be appreciated!

Controls:
LMB - Place particle
MMB - Copy particle
RMB - Delete particle
SPACE - Pause
R - Reset Playfield
Q - Layer View (Debug)
